author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/3893 hasn't been merged yet. You can update the commit that's registered there and I can merge that or I can merge it as is and you can then tag 0.1.1 afterwards. Your preference.
My bad!  I saw a notification from it, but I see now that was just an approval of the PR.  I'll update the commit there.
